name: Battle of Yggdrasil
description:
You play as a viking and fight against the greatest god of them all, Odin!

The battle takes place on the great tree, Yggdrasil. To defeat a god you have bring some weapons with you, so you got a sword and a bow. But be careful your arrows are limited. Odin has also prepared for battle. He attacks you with his spears and his axe. He also throws some lightnings at you if he wants.

During the battle you will change between fighting on ground and in air.

Be careful.

  • Controls:
    • Move: WASD (Controller: LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN, LEFT STICK)
    • Jump: SPACE (Controller: A/X)
    • Sword: J (Controller: X/SQUARE)
    • Bow: K (Controller: B/CIRCLE)
    • Fullscreen: F (Controller: BACK/SELECT)
    • Change Resolution: T

Not every credit goes to me, PucklaMotzer09, so please have a look at the two license files provided with the game.

  • Tested OS
    • Windows 10 (64-Bit)
    • Ubuntu 17.04 (64-Bit)
    • MacOSX 10.9
